definition: a sudden noisy expulsion of air from the lungs that clears the air passages, to exhale abruptly, as when one has a chest cold or congestion
details:
noun
- a sudden noisy expulsion of air from the lungs that clears the air passages
= synonyms: coughing
verb
- to exhale abruptly, as when one has a chest cold or congestion
= example: to exhale abruptly, as when one has a chest cold or congestion
